Os desenvolvedores só fazem besteira, nunca equilibram o jogo, têm missões absurdamente tóxicas com os outros players em conjunto com uma comunidade que só quer o máximo de mal para os outros, mas dá para você se divertir com os amigos depois de perder à vontade de viver. Se você gosta desse tipo de ambiente, esse jogo é perfeito para você,

Welcome to my Dead By Daylight!

I am a highly skilled Dead by Daylight Nurse player. If you have played with me, you will know I am highly skilled and maybe one day you can achieve my greatness at this game Dead by Daylight.

As a professional at this game, Dead by Daylight, I only play it and nothing else, to make sure my skill level is at its best at all times.

If you play as a killer, one important thing to learn is when to face camp survivors, or stand in front of the hook to prevent their teammates from saving them. Facecamping is justified for the following reasons:

Survivors used flashlight in a toxic way (Blinded me)

Survivors pallet stun you when you picked up a survivor

Survivors tea bagged against you

Survivors cleanse your Undying and Ruin totems

Survivors finished gen in front of you before you could grab them

Survivors hook dived to help their teammate get away, utilizing Borrowed Time (BT)

Survivors attempt to mindgame you (not run in a straight line)

Survivors completed their objective (generators) too fast (toxic) before you could kill all four of them

Survivors bring Medkits

Survivors heal each other

Survivors use unfair perks like unbreakable and no mither to extend the game after being outplayed (slugged at 5 gens)

Survivors are live streaming their game on a platform such as Twitch

Survivors do anything that detracts from your positive experience with the game.

For the optimal facecamping experience, buy The Cannibal and sit in front of the hook. Hold right click when they go for the save.


If you stick to these very simple rules of conduct in Dead by Daylight, you will counter the extremely survivor-sided meta that this game is known for. While the game is extremely survivor sided, I have been able to amass enough skill as nurse to overcome this obstacle.

Prepara la masa si la prefieres casera. Puedes hacer una masa de pizza fina o esponjosa, elige tu receta. Si prefieres utilizar una masa precocida, ahorrarás algo de tiempo pero no sabrá igual, así que anímate y prueba estas recetas explicadas paso a paso.
En un pequeño tupper, pon los champiñones laminados (si los has comprado enteros, córtalos en láminas), tapa ligeramente el recipiente e introdúcelo 3 minutos en el microondas. Los champiñones estarán más oscuros y humedecidos.
Mientras estiras la masa sobre un tapete antiadherente, pon el horno a precalentar a 200ºC. Si no tienes que estirarla, procura precalentar el horno durante 10 minutos antes de meter la pizza.
Extiende el tomate sobre la base de pizza, e incorpora el jamón cocido por encima. Córtado en trozos grandes y repártelos por toda la pizza.
Añade la piña cortada en daditos y los champiñones. Por encima, echa orégano al gusto, y el queso de mozzarella de búfala en tiritas.
Coloca la pizza en el molde perforado y métela en el horno a una altura media durante 10-12 minutos, hasta que el queso y la masa empiecen a dorarse.
Cuando esté lista, sácala del horno. Ya verás qué pizza más deliciosa!

Mobile version seemed to have improved alot better than this PC version lately, because i managed to win alot easier there than what i can do on PC version.

So right now i do not recommend this game to anyone until devs get rids of hackers and improve the balance system, by making it put players similar skilled on same side as the everyone else. 

Since atm it only puts random noobs.

I have un-installed game again and it seems i will be keeping it un-installed this time since it has just gotten nothing but worse by years and nothing has been improved!

Update: a year later same issue, killers seems to know exactly where every survivor are. Yet devs has still failed to ban all these hackers. Meet at least 10 killers in a row knowing exactly where you hide and where you are.

Only been playing for a short time but the game itself is fun and rewarding, and most of the community is nice. The killers and survivors in the base game are a good starting point for getting familiar with basic controls without being thrown off by hard to use perks and powers. If you like horror settings and becoming skilled in the controls, this might be for you.

Returned to see if something had changed in the game - [b]no[/b]. 

I. Cross-platform play - dead option, it is better to disable it and it will search the lobby faster.
II. Killers - from the twentieth rank it is difficult to play, especially when newcomers start to play it, the community of survivors is toxic.
III. Survivors - play with friends and acquaintances. Sometimes it’s not better to hope for random people.
Playable only one set of perks(only those who know will understand), although there are many of them, but one build is playable.
IV. The Archives - Not a bad idea for a battle pass, but of course there are very few rewards in the free version. Well, the tasks themselves inside the archives are not bad and do not bring bad bloodpoints.
V. Tutorials - what to say? Not bad and will bring initial bloodpoint capital.
VI. Russian localization - in most cases it is good. But sometimes there are English words in the Russian client that have not been able to prevail for several years. As an example: after you use up the toolbox(and its analogues), the word belt appears abruptly and it hangs in English.
VII. The selection of players is as terrible as possible.

The game is good and you can have a lot of fun but I can't recommend it because of the bad optimization which makes the experience in-game not enjoyable.
